actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend section 414 of the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1969.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to permit families or individuals of higher income levels to live in public low-rent housing facilities as long as the number of such families or individuals does not exceed more than 25 percent of the total number of residents in such facility.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 414 of the Housing and Urban Development Act of 1969.
